name: Meowing Home - #GGJ23
description:
Meowing home is a game about recognition and returning to our roots, creating our future understanding who we are and how to connect with the ones that came before us.

Game made for the 2023 Global Game Jam.

Recommended to use Headphones for a better experience.

If you are interested in some of my Scripts fell free to visit  JpBaraky(github.com) and send me a message

Find your mom 4 times for the ending. :D

Controls

Arrows and WASD - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Ctrl or Mouse Click - Meow (Meowing helps you locate your mom)
